name: TrackSmart
overview:
TrackSmart is the next generation of employee attendance calendars in an easy-to-use online software application. The online attendance calendar comes with all the features of manual forms but with the added bonus of automated record storage, administration, calculations and reporting. TrackSmart guides small business managers and HR professionals through each administrative step of attendance tracking, with a “triggered advice” system that instantly delivers timely information and recommendations as managers work in the application.

In addition to recordkeeping, TrackSmart provides immediate access to tools and tips to identify and address attendance questions and problems right on the spot. Best of all, TrackSmart is free for up to 20 employees.
